addReaction.py.name: AddReaction
addReaction.py.author: Jin Xu and Herbert Sauro
addReaction.py.long_desc: Add different reactions including UniUni, BiUni, UniBi and BiBi.

align_circle.py.name: AlignCircle
align_circle.py.author: Evan Yip (2021)
align_circle.py.long_desc: Aligns the nodes into a circle

captureSBML.py.name: CaptureSBML
captureSBML.py.author: Claire Samuels
captureSBML.py.long_desc: Import a directory of SBML and Antimony files, visualize reactions, capture and save images.
captureSBML.py.short_desc: Visualize and capture SBML or Antimony.

duplicateReaction.py.name: DuplicateReaction
duplicateReaction.py.author: Claire Samuels
duplicateReaction.py.long_desc: Creates an exact copy of the selected reactions and all connected nodes.

exportAntimony.py.name: ExportAntimony
exportAntimony.py.author: Jin Xu
exportAntimony.py.long_desc: Export the Antimony String from the network on canvas.

exportSBML.py.name: ExportSBML
exportSBML.py.author: Jin Xu
exportSBML.py.long_desc: Export the SBML String from the network on canvas and save it to a file.

importSBML.py.name: ImportSBML
importSBML.py.author: Jin Xu
importSBML.py.long_desc: Import an SBML String from a file and visualize it as a network on canvas.

networkX.py.name: Auto Layout
networkX.py.author: Carmen and Herbert M Sauro
networkX.py.long_desc: Rearrange a random network into a neat auto layout

randomNetwork.py.name: RandomNetwork
randomNetwork.py.author: Jin Xu, Herbert M Sauro
randomNetwork.py.long_desc: Display a random network with certain number of species and reactions as input.

simulateNetwork.py.name: Simulate Model
simulateNetwork.py.author: Claire Samuels
simulateNetwork.py.long_desc: Simulate a reaction network using roadrunner and visualize the results.

structuralAnalysis.py.name: StructuralAnalysis
structuralAnalysis.py.author: Jin Xu
structuralAnalysis.py.long_desc: StructuralAnalysis Plugin is to calculate and visualize the stoichiometry matrix and conserved moieties for the network.
